1100101111101000 1101001001101100 0 -> sum: 1001111001010100, cout: 1
1010000011111100 0100011110110000 0 -> sum: 1110100010101100, cout: 0
1011001001101100 1101001101000001 0 -> sum: 1000010110101101, cout: 1
1111010101110001 0011100100010011 0 -> sum: 0010111010000100, cout: 1
0001000010111110 0010110100000000 0 -> sum: 0011110110111110, cout: 0

0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
